name: Agema
flavor: A derivative of the Gatewatch pattern, Agema armor incorporates the lessons of too many bloody stands.

name: Arihant
flavor: All Light has a source: a fire, a filament, a star. Battle is how we seek that origin." - Pujari, The Transcripts

name: Armada
flavor: "Get behind me."

name: Astrolord Plate
flavor: War is the struggle to exist. Everything real is a combatant.

name: Blindsight Plate
flavor: "I shrouded myself so when the Light returned I could see it all the clearer." —Parables of the Allspring

name: BRONTIOS
flavor: Subtlety is overrated.

name: Commando
flavor: The Vanguard selects elite Titans to form commando cadres.

name: Commando Custom
flavor: Commando tactical rig repurposed for Crucible competition.

name: Crest of Alpha Lupi
flavor: Whoever survives our passing does so only by our consent.

name: Cuirass of the Witness
flavor: "One king falls. Ten rise to take the power." —Variks

name: Dead Light Plate
flavor: "Success is not about survival. It is about discovery." —Arach Modesta

name: Desolate Plate
flavor: Take your new shape.

name: DURGA-GNT
flavor: I am a DURGA-GNT LOAD BEARING CUIRASS. Feed me bullets.

name: Duskrender
flavor: He never sought glory or prizes. Only peace.

name: Elector's Heart
flavor: They will know you fight not for yourself, but for the people's will.

name: Exodus Plate
flavor: Humanity has been caged. We will break the bars.

name: Fieldplate
flavor: History is a question of armor. What will it take to kill us? Fieldplate says: much more than this.

name: Firebreak
flavor: Beneath the armored superstructure, Titan plate is tiled with inertial sinks and field drivers.

name: Garuda
flavor: "We will not follow the orders of a craven and a sycophant." —Lilavati-12

name: Gatewatch
flavor: Born in the dark age that followed the Collapse, this is a formidable defense for the novice Titan.

name: Gwalior
flavor: The Gwalior pattern improves on standard Fieldplate while remaining economical.

name: Harrowed War Numen's Chest
flavor: Death is the game, and the game is always death.

name: Heart of the Justicar
flavor: The City is divided. We must unite beneath a single will.

name: Heart of the Order
flavor: The City is divided. We must unite beneath a single will.

name: Heliopause Plate
flavor: The Sun used to give us life. Now, staying near the Sun will be our doom.

name: Hesperos
flavor: This suit was designed as an homage to the Golden Age Hesperonauts.

name: Highlander
flavor: The breastplate is reinforced by ribs of relic iron, as tough as it is precious.

name: Holdfast
flavor: "I didn't get shot. I never get shot. I just body-checked the missile."

name: Illyrian
flavor: Not so much a formal Firebreak variant as the collected wisdom of Titans interested in peak performance.

name: Immanent War Plate
flavor: Conflict is the mother of reality.

name: Infinite Lines Plate
flavor: "I saw myself! Slaying the Darkness! That's what I saw!" —RECORD 344-CHASM-6872

name: Iron Breed Plate
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Companion Plate
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Regalia Plate
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Ithacan
flavor: "I'm Nobody."

name: Jovian Guard
flavor: In Jovian exploration, as in all things, the Titans will lead the charge.

name: Kabr's Wrath
flavor: In the aftermath, he became obsessed with the machines.

name: Kallipolis Plate
flavor: The City's ruler must be a warrior as well as a philosopher.

name: Kellslayer's Cuirass
flavor: I am a walking tank. My arsenal, endless. The result of my ire, devastation.

name: Knight
flavor: Every Guardian is a priceless resource. Titan armor is an incubator for legends.

name: Lightmail
flavor: Fabricated by your Ghost with available mass, this basic armor is very thin on plating.

name: Molniya
flavor: Armored in the thunderbolt.

name: Molniya Custom
flavor: Match-grade superheavy armor: a wearable tank.

name: Monitor
flavor: "The Cabal centurion opened up on her at point-blank, and we heard the most fearsome sound. She was laughing."

name: Murvaux
flavor: "Luke Romagne. Gave his last full measure in the European Dead Zone." —The Last Stands of First Pillars

name: MYCENAE
flavor: More at home in a museum than in the field.

name: Objekt 959 Plate
flavor: Prototype assault armor repurposed for Crucible play.

name: Oblivion Plate
flavor: Humanity has been caged. We will break the bars.

name: Pacorus
flavor: "No father should have to bury their child."

name: Pandion
flavor: Crucible variant. The shock-tempering aerofoam harness is designed to absorb punishment.

name: Plate of No Tomorrow
flavor: War is the struggle to exist. Everything real is a combatant.

name: Plate of the Exile
flavor: "Let the heat melt your body so your soul might flow with the river of time." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Plate of the Pariah
flavor: "I welcome every challenge, for it only makes me stronger." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Plate of the Seven
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Queen's Guard Plate
flavor: An Awoken relic from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Raku Crucible Type
flavor: Crucible custom. Foamed plate structure with tight tolerances and overbuilt field drivers.

name: Raku Fulcrum
flavor: Crucible custom. Annealed plate boundaries provide superior shock distribution.

name: Scoutmail
flavor: This lightweight scout armor is durable and easily maintained.

name: Spearhead
flavor: "This burn's from a slug rifle. That one's a shock blade. This one...ah, yes. Wei Ning gave me a hug."

name: Spektar (All Types)
flavor: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

name: Taroudant
flavor: Treat your armor with the same care that the first Titans treated the City walls.

name: The Armamentarium
flavor: For This, There Is One Remedy

name: Toutatis
flavor: Named for an ancient divinity, this pattern is built for targeted, aggressive action.

name: Twilight Garrison
flavor: "One day the Last City will be known as the First City."

name: Ursus Tactical
flavor: You don't wear full battle rattle to a Crucible match unless you expect something to interrupt the match.

name: Vanir
flavor: The legend of Ragnarok does not end with the death of the gods. There is a new world to build.

name: VISIGOTH
flavor: The preferred armor pattern of Jagi's Host.

name: War Numen's Chest
flavor: Death is the game, and the game is always death.

name: Watchers' Plate
flavor: "'Out of sight, out of mind,' they say. The Speaker wishes this was true." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Willbreaker's Resolve
flavor: Their blades break against your heart.

name: Winged Sun Plate
flavor: "Like a meteor burning until nothing is left but the idea of a Light." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Zhurong
flavor: Surrender is never an option.

name: Stellar Impact Plate
flavor: Welcome to Mark 2 STELLAR IMPACT. Have a nice war!

name: Scarab's Vigil Plate
flavor: "If you wish to learn the ways of war, look around you." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Iron Saga Plate
flavor: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

name: Days of Iron Cuirass
flavor: "When we feared the sun would ne'er on heroes rise again, whose deeds began the new Days of Iron?" —The New-Forged Song

name: Cosmoclast Plate
flavor: I'm not sure what you mean, General. Is this still about the Exodus program? ~SIVA.MEM.WB012

name: Raku Gwener Type 1
flavor: Crucible Variant. Modified by the Raku group to meet Lord Shaxx's rigorous standards.

name: Mangonel Type 2
flavor: "If the terrain does not suit your purposes, reshape it." —Lord Silimar

name: High Command Plate
flavor: Power is not a gift. It is a calling.

name: Eon Tracer Plate
flavor: "Eternities streamed past me like shooting stars…" —RECORD-449-CHASM-6887

name: Endling Plate
flavor: We are the last of our species.

name: Plate of Triumph
flavor: You carry this mythical insignia as lightly as you carried the weight of the world.
